thread.title: Nikon restructuring causes casualties to bottom line, camera line, and production line
thread.title_full: Nikon restructuring causes casualties to bottom line, camera line, and production line

author: Pollyanna
title: Nikon restructuring causes casualties to bottom line, camera line, and production line
text:
By Devin Coldewey 
Nikon’s plan to restructure in the face of challenges to the digital imaging space has proven more costly than expected in more ways than one. A rough quarter means the company will not only miss profit expectations, but will have to buy out a thousand employees and end its DL line of compact cameras. Read More 
Read more here:: techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
